intent_routes.question: What languages is the Nemesis manual available in?
question_variations: Which languages can I get the Nemesis manual in?
What language options are there for the Nemesis guide?
Is the Nemesis manual available in my language?
intent_routes.answer: The Nemesis manual is available in 11 languages: English, Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Suomi (Finnish), Français (French), Italiano (Italian), Nederlands (Dutch), Norsk (Norwegian), Português (Portuguese), Svenska (Swedish), and 中文 (Chinese)

intent_routes.question: Where can I find the Nemesis manual online?
question_variations: How do I download the Nemesis manual?
What is the website for the Nemesis guide?
Can I access the Nemesis manual on the web?
intent_routes.answer: The Nemesis manual can be found online at www.bandg.com

intent_routes.question: What page is the English manual on?
question_variations: Which page number has the English instructions?
Where is the English section located?
What page do the English instructions start on?
intent_routes.answer: The English manual starts on page 3

intent_routes.question: How do I access the Home screen?
question_variations: Where is the Home screen?
How do I get to the Home screen?
How can I return to Home?
intent_routes.answer: The Home screen is accessed by selecting the Home button

intent_routes.question: What does the Settings button do?
question_variations: Where are the system settings?
How do I access settings?
What is the Settings button for?
intent_routes.answer: The Settings button gives access to the system settings

intent_routes.question: What is the Browser button used for?
question_variations: How do I access the web browser?
Can I browse the internet?
What does the Browser button do?
intent_routes.answer: The Browser button can be used to access the B&G CPU web server or for browsing the internet

intent_routes.question: How do I create a new dashboard?
question_variations: Where is the new dashboard option?
Can I make a custom dashboard?
How to add a new dashboard?
intent_routes.answer: Select the new dashboard option in the Dashboards section to create a custom dashboard

intent_routes.question: What is the dashboard bar?
question_variations: Where can I find my pinned dashboards?
What shows in the dashboard bar?
How do I see recent dashboards?
intent_routes.answer: The dashboard bar shows pinned dashboards (user favorites) and recently used dashboards

intent_routes.question: How do I turn on the Nemesis system?
question_variations: What's the power up procedure for Nemesis?
How to start the Nemesis unit?
Can you tell me how to power on Nemesis?
intent_routes.answer: The unit automatically turns ON when power is applied to the system.

intent_routes.question: What happens on first startup of Nemesis?
question_variations: How does initial setup work?
What's the first time startup process?
Will I see a setup wizard on first use?
intent_routes.answer: On first startup or after factory reset, the unit displays a setup wizard that guides you through screen orientation, language, and other basic settings configuration.
references: Quick Guide, Page 3, First Time Startup Section

intent_routes.question: How do I unlock the Nemesis screen in landscape mode?
question_variations: What's the process to unlock landscape orientation?
How can I unlock my Nemesis display in landscape?
Screen unlock procedure for landscape mode?
intent_routes.answer: To unlock the screen in landscape orientation, swipe from the right edge of the display.
references: Quick Guide, Page 3, Lock/Unlock Screen Section

intent_routes.question: How do I unlock the Nemesis screen in portrait mode?
question_variations: What's the process to unlock portrait orientation?
How can I unlock my Nemesis display in portrait?
Screen unlock procedure for portrait mode?
intent_routes.answer: To unlock the screen in portrait orientation, swipe from the bottom of the display.
references: Quick Guide, Page 3, Lock/Unlock Screen Section

intent_routes.question: How do I lock the Nemesis screen?
question_variations: What's the method to lock the display?
Can I manually lock the screen?
How to lock Nemesis display?
intent_routes.answer: When the dashboard bar is shown, press the lock button to lock the screen. The screen also locks automatically when idle for a period of time.
references: Quick Guide, Page 3, Lock/Unlock Screen Section

intent_routes.question: Can I change the settings I chose during initial setup?
question_variations: Are first time setup settings permanent?
How do I modify initial configuration?
Can setup wizard settings be changed later?
intent_routes.answer: Yes, any settings made during the first time setup can be changed later from the system settings menu.
references: Quick Guide, Page 3, First Time Startup Section

intent_routes.question: How do I pin a dashboard?
question_variations: How can I add a dashboard to the dashboard bar?
What's the process to pin dashboards?
How do you pin dashboards to the bar?
intent_routes.answer: On the home screen, press and hold on the dashboard you want to pin to the dashboard bar. You can pin it to a new position or overwrite an existing position.

intent_routes.question: How do I unpin a dashboard?
question_variations: How can I remove a dashboard from the bar?
What's the process to unpin dashboards?
How do you delete pinned dashboards?
intent_routes.answer: From the dashboard bar, press and hold to display the unpin option.

intent_routes.question: How do I switch between dashboards?
question_variations: How can I change dashboards?
How do I navigate between pinned dashboards?
What's the way to move between dashboards?
intent_routes.answer: Swipe left or right to change between pinned dashboards.

intent_routes.question: How do I edit a dashboard?
question_variations: How can I modify my dashboard?
What's the process to change a dashboard?
How to customize dashboard settings?
intent_routes.answer: On the home screen, press and hold on the dashboard you want to edit

intent_routes.question: How do I delete a dashboard?
question_variations: Can I remove a dashboard?
What's the way to delete dashboards?
How to erase a dashboard?
intent_routes.answer: On the home screen, press and hold on the dashboard you want to delete

intent_routes.question: How do I customize gauge settings?
question_variations: Can I modify gauge displays?
How to change gauge parameters?
What's the process to adjust gauges?
intent_routes.answer: Press and hold on the gauge to display the edit options

intent_routes.question: How do I change gauge settings?
question_variations: How can I modify gauge data?
Where do I customize gauge display?
How to edit gauge information?
intent_routes.answer: Select the gauge settings option (A) to choose which data will be shown on the gauge display

intent_routes.question: How do I resize a gauge?
question_variations: Can I make gauges bigger or smaller?
How to change gauge size?
Is it possible to adjust gauge dimensions?
intent_routes.answer: Select option B to resize the gauge to desired dimensions

intent_routes.question: Where are the system settings located?
question_variations: How do I access system settings?
Where do I find system settings?
How to get to system settings menu?
intent_routes.answer: System settings can be accessed from the home screen

intent_routes.question: How do I access the Quick access menu?
question_variations: Where is the Quick access menu?
How to open Quick access menu?
What gesture opens Quick access?
intent_routes.answer: Swipe from the top edge of the display to access the Quick access menu

intent_routes.question: Where can I find product documentation?
question_variations: How do I get updated manuals?
Where are the latest product manuals?
How to access documentation?
intent_routes.answer: The latest information and updated documentation can be found at www.bandg.com
